column4: anyone have problems with 9.10 and ext4 from a brand new install?
computer was locking up, it has had a history of doing this i think the disk is just cooked, retrying with a new had i had lying around...
my experience with ext4 was no different than with any previous file systems I've used. The HD may be already defective as you say.
ext4 was/is very stable during the time I used it, no data corruption, fast error recoveries, reasonably fast operation, no complaints.
